control_description: Check if any security group allows ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 or ::0/0 to the ports 21(FTP), 25(SMTP), 110(POP3), 135(RCP), 143(IMAP), 445(CIFS), 3000(Go, Node.js, Ruby web developemnt frameworks), 4333(ahsp), 5000(Python web dev frameworks).
risk: Wide-open security groups increase the attack surface.
recommendation: Make sure to limit inbound traffic as strictly as possible.
